name: Police   Pig#042
description:
42th work of art from the Pig Collection
The pig is a symbol of wealth and fertility, so I chose the pig as the representative of this collection (in the first stage). In this collection, I have depicted pigs in the form of characters, each of which represents the personality, cortex and symbol of a specific concept so that I can use these symbols and concepts in the life of modern man.
Road map:
This collection contains 100 works of art that will be uploaded to Hicetnunc from issue 31 onwards under the title ONE OF ONE. From 31 to 100, the price of works also increases every 10 times. 10 works are uploaded every week.
Numbers 51 to 60 will be uploaded next week
